tool_description: Validates the feasibility of proposed meeting schedules by checking constraints, resource availability, and potential scheduling conflicts.

proposed_schedule.description: Proposed meeting schedule with date, time, and duration

error_messages: Invalid schedule format: proposed_schedule must be a valid ISO 8601 timestamp.
Invalid duration: duration_minutes must be between 15 and 480 minutes.
Schedule in the past: proposed_schedule must be in the future.
Weekend scheduling issue: Schedule falls on weekend when weekend meetings are disabled.
Outside business hours: Schedule falls outside configured business hours.
Resource unavailability: Required resources are not available at the proposed time.
usage: Provide proposed_schedule and duration_minutes. The tool validates against business rules and returns feasibility assessment with specific issues identified.

is_feasible.description: Whether the proposed schedule is feasible

alternative_times.description: Suggested alternative times if current proposal is not feasible
